## Form.removeListOfValues() method

Remove the LOV for the given block and field

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeListOfValues(block: string, field: string | string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | string | The block associated with the LOV. |
|  field | string \| string\[\] | The field associated with the LOV, or an array of fields. |

**Returns:**

void
